Key Match Events: Martinique and Guyana split points on day two.
Pre-Game Insights: Martinique comes in after two wins, the same number of draws and one loss, so they will be looking to return to winning ways and give their home fans something to cheer about.
Guyana comes into this game with four defeats in the last five matches played, the only match won was against Belize, where they won three goals to one.
